html:
Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more.

In this Omniheroes codes guide, players can find the latest information regarding active codes and how they can be redeemed.

If you love free items and want to gain an edge in this action-packed adventure game then you are at the right place.

Players can enter the gift codes to receive amazing rewards like Gold, Diamonds, Tickets, and more.

Omniheroes is not the only game featured on our website that allows players to enter gift codes for rewards.

Our website has some of the most played games out there like Aur, Outerplane, and Shoot Wall Simulator.

Active Codes

  • Annic5
    • 500 Diamonds,
  • ANNADSUM5
    • Exclusive rewards (New)
  • ANNGEM500
    • Exclusive rewards
  • OH1stAnn
    • Exclusive rewards
  • OMNIHEROES Redeem this gift code for Diamonds 77, Gold 77000, Summon Ticket II 1
  • OH777
    • 300 Diamonds, 77777 Gold, 1 Summon Ticket II, 77 Ascension Ore, 7 Summon Ticket I, 7 x 5-Star Hero Shard, 7x 4-Star Hero Shard, 77x 3-Star Hero Shard
  • JoinOH
    • 200 Diamonds, 20000 Gold
  • SE1FBK
  • AWSCD3
  • STSFTO
  • XMAS2023
  • THANKS
  • OHTHXGIVING
    • Diamonds 200 + Summon Ticket I 10
  • OHWEEKEND
    • Diamonds 100 + Gold 100,000 + Geovein Crystal (Uncommon) 300
  • 3RDWEEKEND
    • Diamonds 200 + Gold 100,000+ Geovein Crystal (Uncommon) 300
  • STPATRICKOH
    • Diamonds 200 + Ascension Ore 100 + Lily of the Valley 5 + Lakegreen Stone 5 + Jade Shard Pendant 5 + Jade Dagger 5
  • EASTEROH23
    • Diamonds 200 + Summon Ticket II 2 + Gold 100,000
  • FBDCOH2023
    • Diamonds 200 + Summon Ticket II 2 + Gold 100,000
  • OH555
  • OH000
  • OH999
  • OH888
  • OMNISTART
  • Pre500000
  • OMNIGPF2023
  • FBG1000A
  • OMNIHEROES

How To Redeem Codes In Omniheroes

New players of the game might not know how to redeem the active codes to receive the rewards.

Below is the step-by-step process:

  1. Open the game on your mobile device.
  2. Click your Avatar in the top left corner of your screen.
  3. Click on Settings.
  4. Click on the Gift Code option.
  5. Enter one of the active codes featured in this article.
  6. Enjoy your free rewards!

What Codes Do In Omniheroes?

The active codes in the game will give players various rewards like Gold, Diamonds, and other in-game currency.

Each of these active codes can only be claimed once and will only be available for a certain period.

Code Not Working

If a code does not work it may have expired. Codes are only available for a certain period.

Let us know in the comment section below if any of the active codes in this article did not work for you.

How To Find New Codes

Players can search for the game name on our website to find more information regarding active codes.

Players can also check out the game's Discord Server for updates regarding active codes.

Conclusion:

We recommend that players try out all of the active codes as there are a lot available for this game.

Let us know in the comment section if you have found any additional active codes for the game.

Jean-Roux has been a professional writer for 1 year now, however his passion for mobile gaming extends for over 10 years. He loves shooter and sport games, and his current favorite mobile game is PubG Mobile. He holds a Bcom Digital Marketing Degree, and as well as writing for Playoholic, he works with Sitetrail and GC Media Holdings.
